ANSIBLE_MODULE_ARGS.payload:
debug: true
ldap:
  enabled: true
  listen: '0.0.0.0:389'
ldaps:
  enabled: false
  listen: '0.0.0.0:636'
backend:
  datastore: config
  baseDN: 'dc=glauth,dc=com'
users:
  - name: admin
    loginShell: /bin/bash
    homeDir: /home/admin
    unixid: 5001
    primarygroup: 6001
groups:
  - name: admins
    unixid: 6001
api:
  enabled: false
